entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
